column4: could someone reccommend me a non-stupid audio player other than vlc, banshee, and rhythmbox? they all have their own special retarded bugs

i need an audio player that doesnt 1) randomly stop playing music until a restart. 2) can play music overa local network without skipping every 10 seconds. 3) doesnt crash when removing large amounts of audio files whos file-path has been disconnected (unmounted)
